message: Accept my generous offer and we can call it a day!
Meet me halfway, let's be fair!
I'm not willing to give up so much, let's see what's next!
You're not getting the better deal, Bob!
You're being greedy, Alice! Meet me in the middle again!
No way, Bob! I'm not getting taken advantage of!
You can't handle the truth, Bob. This is my final offer!
You're not being serious, Alice. I'll take the majority!
You think you're getting the majority? Think again, Bob!
Let's find a middle ground, Bob. Meet me halfway!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'll take most of the cake!
You're being ruthless, Bob. I won't let you take everything!
You're not getting away with everything, Bob. This is my last stand!
You're not even trying to negotiate, Alice. I'll take almost everything!
You're being ridiculous, Bob. I won't let you walk all over me!
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's make a deal!
It's now or never, Alice. Take it or leave it!
No way, Bob. I'd rather walk away with nothing than accept such a lopsided deal!
